page.title: 11Recent headlines,St.Albans.
page.content: The{main stories}from the{"Herts.Ad" from{17th May-7th June 1985:}School coach crash in France;local politics;a bank robbery in Marshalswick St.Albans Five children,a teacher and the driver died in a {coach crash}in Ledignan{ {France.}The driver collapsed and died from a brain haemorrhage.When one of the teachers realised the driver was ill,he tried to take the wheel.The coach rolled onto it's roof, crushing some of the passengers.The party,all on an{adventure holiday}were from {Beaumont and Verulam schools.}After the{District council}elections,the { {Lab.Party}decided to split from the { {S.D.P./Lib.Alliance.}This means the Alliance will have to get their policies passed with a {majority of 6} over the {Con.party.}The{bank}robbery was at LLoyds Quadrant branch.The raiders escaped with Â£60,000. {
